thread.title: Karrueche Files Restraining Order Against Chris Brown, Claiming He Threatened Her Life
thread.title_full: Karrueche Files Restraining Order Against Chris Brown, Claiming He Threatened Her Life

author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Karrueche Files Restraining Order Against Chris Brown, Claiming He Threatened Her Life
text:
1 
Karrueche Tran has filed a restraining order against Chris Brown, TMZ reports. 
The former flames have gotten into social media spats recently, but now the model is claiming that Breezy took his anger too far. Karrueche says in her sworn statement in the case that he “told a few people that he was going to kill” her and “threatened to shoot” her as well as saying that if he couldn’t date her, then she was off limits to anyone else. 
She also testifies that Brown physically assaulted her, including punching her in the stomach and pushing her down some stairs. 
Brown posted a clip to Instagram Tuesday afternoon, vaguely addressing “this bullshit” and telling his fans not to listen to “what the people on the other side doing.” Feb 21, 2017 at 12:22pm PST 
Brown was given five years probation in 2009 for assaulting Rihanna . 
The Virginia artist made headlines a month ago when he posted an Instagram video admitting he was a jealous boyfriend . 
“If I love you, bitch, ain’t nobody gon’ have you,” he said. “Imma make you miserable. Imma chase that nigga out, Imma chase your ass around.” Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You! Thank You! Thank You!
